data.message: It's not about you dissing Trump or sharing your political views which I think you shouldn't do but is your right. It's about how shitty,lame and weak it was. That shit is embarrassing then you have to go and say a big fuck you to your fans who fucking got you where you are today, no fuck you you liberal cry baby hypocrite  bitch!! It's OK for you to stereotype Trump supporters as stupid recknecks  in your whack and terribly rhymed "diss" cypher though right!
